sub_title: Chief Marketing Officer at Favorite Gifts B.V.
summary:
Managing Director / CEO with a demonstrated history in bringing companies van A to Better. Specialized in start-ups, scale-ups and next level transformations. More than twenty years of international experience in change management, business development and concept creation in both B2B as B2C with structural, proven successes. Strong people manager who knows how to connect and engage. Results-oriented and driven professional with a Bachelor of Business Administration (B.B.A.) certificate. Skilled strategist with a strong expertise in brand building, (online) marketing, E-Commerce, Omnichannel, selective distribution and balancing traditional retail with (direct) online distribution and flag ship stores. Do you want to have the most detailed, objective and authentic impression possible? Then please also read the recommendations below.

Summary keywords: change management, general management, start-ups, scale-ups, next level transformations, business development, concept creation, B2B, B2C, brand building, digital marketing, selective distribution, ecommerce, omnichannel, flag ship stores, retail, marketing, sales, P & L responsibility, international experience, people manager, leading, coaching, recruitment, HR management, sales, marketing, IT, sales back office, customer service, logistics, after sales, service.

European importer and distributor of promotional products through four different Business Units: Van Helden (distributor), Van Heijster (distributor), Eurogifts (distributor) and Giving Europe (wholesale).

ASSIGNMENT
Centralization & Next Level Transformation.

TASKS
Centralization and management of all marketing departments and activities of the four different Business Units.
Launch of a new web platform for all the Business Units, including the implementation of a PIM/MDM system.
Full repositioning of the four different brands, including the development of four related brand identities.
Development and implementation of counter-, recovery- and reset plans, anticipating on the effects of the COVID-19 crisis.
Development and implementation of a completely new price systematic, including setting up all the related processes and organization.

profile_positions.description:
COMPANY
Dutch and Belgian subsidiaries of Weber, the American (private equity owned) manufacturer of premium barbecues & accessories.

ASSIGNMENT
Next Level Transformation & Scale-Up.

TASKS
Merging Weber-Stephen Holland BV and Weber-Stephen Products Belgium BVBA to one independent and strong Benelux organization.
Managing the total organization of Weber Benelux with full P & L responsibility.
Leading and coaching the management team (Sales, Marketing, Finance, Logistics & Planning, Customer Service, After Sales, Human Resources, IT).
Constantly professionalizing and optimizing the efficiency of processes within the organization.
Determining all relevant targets and KPI’s for the organization in general and per department or/and manager specifically.
Building and maintaining an informal and decisive company/team culture.
Implementing a selective distribution system in combination with a transparent dealer (condition) structure and direct-to-consumer sales (online, brand store). 
Developing new plans and concepts in order to boost the sales and profit results in a way that fits a premium brand, like for example the Weber Grill Academy workshops.
Identifying and creating new opportunities and/or partnerships to expand the existing business model.
Increasing brand awareness and sales conversion with strong consumer marketing plans consisting of for example holistic marketing (media) campaigns, strong promotions activities, shop-in-shop, local hero programs and events.
Analyzing and reporting trends, developments, threats and opportunities in the market in order to anticipate on these as well as possible.
Member of the Top Leadership Team EMEA. Reporting and keeping daily contact with the Head Office in Germany to support, align and succesfully translate the global strategy into strong local measures.

RESULTS
For achieved results, please see my résumé which can be send to you upon request.
